p.img: Akron Digital offers Student-Centered Learning for Grades 6-12

img.title: rsz_2dsc00520_sharp

p.style: z-index: 5; min-width: 890px; max-width: 890px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 27px; line-height: 40px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;

img.p: Akron Digital Academy will be closed for the 2018-19 school year. All student records will be sent to students' district of residence based on the last known address reported by the student by July 7, 2018. If you have any questions please contact Akron Digital Academy Administration 330 237-2200 adaclosing@akrondigital.k12.oh.us or Ohio Department of Education 614 728-7739 SchoolSponsorship@education.ohio.gov

div.p:
When you are ready to choose a
quality learner-centered educational option,
we are here to help At Akron Digital, every student matters!
Every Akron Digital Student receives a Free Google Chromebook with successful enrollment.
See what's happening at Akron Digital Schools this year with our new event calendar. Be sure not to miss a thing!

div.h3: Need a ride? Metro can help!
div.p: Need a ride to one of Akron Digital Locations? Click here to view the entire Metro bus schedule and visit us today!
